title: Things Are Going Well on Campus, NJIT President Says
itunes:title: Things Are Going Well on Campus, NJIT President Says
description:
We set the Businessweek Agenda with Bloomberg Intelligence Chief Equity Strategist Gina Martin Adams and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson. Dr. Joel Bloom, President of NJIT, talks about how the coronavirus is impacting education and the need for more STEM learning. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Mike Regan, Senior Editor of Bloomberg Markets Live Blog, discuss the story “Markets Were Already Braced for Chaos—Then Came the Diagnosis.” And we Drive to the Close with Vance Howard, CEO at Howard Capital Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
